name: Numlock
description:
You're being chased by a spooky hand through an endless hallway! The only way out is to arbitrarily solve the number puzzles on each door ahead before you're grabbed! Actually that's a lie! Because this game is of the endless variety, and would go on regardless!

Check it out! It's all the fun of putting numbers into a calculator with a time limit!

Whipped this up for the #tshirtjam within like 4 or 5 days. Development was such a haze... I know I enjoy the style of gameplay on hand, but will you? Who can say...

I need another nap...
